title: KVNU
text:
Amy Schumer Defends Her "SNL" Khloé Kardashian Joke Posted just a moment ago 
Dana Edelson/NBC (NEW YORK) -- Amy Schumer insists she didn't mean to offend Khloé Kardashian with a joke she made at her expense during her Saturday Night Live monologue this past weekend. 
"We used to have Khloé. Khloé was ours, right?" joked Schumer on Saturday. "Whenever there's a group of women, you identify with one of them, right?…But Khloé -- she lost half her body weight. She lost a Kendall." 
On Monday, however, the 34-year-old actress/comedienne defended her comment on Twitter , insisting, "Nothing but love for that family. I like idea of sending women the message to be happy in their own skin." The tweet was accompanied by a photo of her baby niece. 
That message was in response to Kardashian's tweet a day earlier, defending her 35-pound weight loss. "No need 2 tear down others just 2 make urself feel bigger," she wrote. "It actually makes u quite small. I'm on a healthy journey. I don't care 4the hate." 
This isn't Schumer's first run-in with the Kardashians. Back in April, she belly-flopped in front of Kim Kardashian and Kanye West at the TIME 100 Gala red carpet.
